(Program
  (Case
    (Identifier)
    (When
      (Args
        (Identifier))
    {+(Identifier)+}
    {+(When
        (Args
          (Identifier))
        (Args
          (Identifier))
        (Else
          (Identifier)))+}))
{-(Case
    (When
      (Args
        (Boolean))
      (StringLiteral)))-})
